properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 3 at 10:20AM EST until February 5 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lakeshore flooding and erosion expected.

* WHERE...Huron, Sanilac and St. Clair Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Onshore or alongshore wind and high waves will
intensify flooding of prone areas along the lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northerly winds will ramp up late tonight
into tomorrow morning, with gusts around 30 mph during the day
on Tuesday. Large waves will crash onshore along the southern
Lake Huron shoreline leading to lakeshore flooding and erosion.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
